attributes.action: Increase public participation in the debate surrounding NHS reforms.
attributes.background: In successive polls, the British public has listed the NHS as one one of its most valued institutions.  NHS England is currently being reorganised with no public mandate as plans were not included in the governments last manifesto. We request greater public involvement in deciding its future.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to increase public involvement in decisions about NHS reforms.
